title: 关于神秘时代节点生成率问题
author: 我很想你
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: tianxinketx
replies.txt_content:
打开.minecraft/config文件夹 找到Thaumcraft.cfg
用记事本打开，Ctrl+F搜索node_rarity
# How rare nodes are in the world. The number means there will be (on average) one node per N chunks.
    I:node_rarity=36
等号后面就是节点生成率，比如这个就是36区块生成一个节点
